lines.text: [Dramatic music]
Last time on Trebuchet Village, our heroes continued their voyage through the seas in the body of the submarine Changeling Chuggie.
Deftly avoiding a Squidward and his ranted shark, the gang settled on an island of magical fun with no DM parental supervision.
Afterwards, they headed back down into the sea to play a shell game with a friendly croc-topus and his infant, gathering some very neat and very strong items.
After a few more days of uneventful traveling through the perilous sea-bomb, the gang rests atop an island for their latest in a string of nappies.
